item.description:
What would rather have? Fast-fried hydrogenated oil high-fructose corn syrup mall food or an awesome casual get together where Dungeon Masters can discuss perils and strategy galore?

Now I know what you're gonna say... "Can't we have both?"

OF COURSE YOU CAN TIMMY!

We're calling out to all DMs of current or future games to meetup and discuss new ways to hurt... err challenge your players. We'll discuss whatever you need about your campaign or adventure and find ways to help as a group.

Bring ideas, maps, NPCs, scrap paper, and a healthy appetite for epicurean dining.

For more information, see http://www.prudential...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: DM's Food Court Frenzy Workshop
